channel.title: Assassin with royal blood
channel.description:
#### What happened? Drunk was converted to Unseen and was alcoholic for a turn. The king died along with assassin during the night and the former alcoholic could up himself with royal blood to the throne even he became the new assassin.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Assassin should not have royal blood to step up to the throne.
#### Steps to reproduce: Have any royal blooded Unseen members to convert assassin during night and try to step up with royal blood.
#### Comments: Same bug happened on two different occasions, once with alcoholic turned assassin and once with aristocrat.

item.title: Assassin with royal blood
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Otherwise, if a dead Unseen showed up that night or previous night, and BD knows there is only two Unseen, if itâ€™s King election, everyone who steps up is confirmed BD. And someone with previous claims may not be able to stick to them anymore.

item.title: Assassin with royal blood
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
This is not a bug. Royal blood is maintained no matter what.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin with royal blood
item.dc:creator: Laiskis
item.description:
What happened?

Drunk was converted to Unseen and was alcoholic for a turn. The king died along with assassin during the night and the former alcoholic could up himself with royal blood to the throne even he became the new assassin.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Assassin should not have royal blood to step up to the throne.

Steps to reproduce:

Have any royal blooded Unseen members to convert assassin during night and try to step up with royal blood.

Comments:

Same bug happened on two different occasions, once with alcoholic turned assassin and once with aristocrat.

Read full topic
